decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Proposed Site Plan 2022/843/P/07 | Condition 4 of 224653FUL is hereby amended to:

A minimum of three (3) cycle parking space shall be provided on site in the front garden area of the building in accordance with the submitted documentation and the adopted standards of the London Plan (2021). Such provision shall be retained permanently.

Reason: To provide adequate facilities for cyclists, in accordance with Ealing Sustainable Transport SPG (2013), policy T5 of the London Plan (2021) and National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 9.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow correction to the wording of Condition 4 in relation to planning permission reference: 224653FUL dated 25/01/2023 for 'Conversion of existing 2-bedroom flat into two self-contained units; roof extension to main rear roofslope; roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope; installation of three rooflights to front roofslope; and removal of chimneys '
